FINANCEX_SOLUTION: FinanceX is a convenient, reliable and secure exchange platform for trading digital assets using local currencies
ABOUT_US_P_1: FinanceX is a world-class digital asset exchange that provides the ability to trade in local currencies (fiat). FinanceX is moving toward providing convenient, reliable and secure services which help customers buy and sell digital assets in real time. Traders can buy, sell and manage digital assets in fiat without any constraints or any risk of exchange rates. Established by a team of fin-tech experts, and backed by financial institutions from Japan, Singapore, and US, FinanceX inherits years of experiences in development, operation, and management of forex and stock exchanges. FinanceX provides customers with the most secure, reliable and real-time platform for trading
ABOUT_US_P_2: FinanceX is a global digital asset exchange trading in fiat
REALTIME_AND_HIGH_PERFORMANCE_DESC: High volume real-time trading, millions of transactions per second
LOWER_COST_AND_FEE_DESC: Low trading fee, competitive and cost saving of more than 10% compared to coin-to-coin
ALL_DEVICES_COVERED_DESC: Responsive user experience on web, tablet, and mobile devices
EXCHANGE_BY_CRYPTO_CURRENCY__FIAT_DESC: Intuitive exchange interface, seamless payments in fiat currencies
MULTIPLE_LANGUAGE_SUPPORT_DESC: Language support: English, Chinese, Japanese, Vietnamese, Thai, Indonesian, etc
PORTFOLIO_MANAGEMENT_DESC: Easy to manage your portfolios in real-time
SAFETY_STABILITY_DESC: Protection from DDoS attacks, 2 layer security using Two-factor authentication (2FA), Withdrawals protection, Cold wallets,...
MOBILE_APP_DESC: Do not miss investment opportunities by having fully functioning access at all times with the app on iOS and Android platforms
FINANCEX_ADDRESS: Suite 102, Ground Floor, Blake Building, Corner Eyre & Hutson Streets, Belize City, Belize. Singapore Office: 470 North Bridge Road, #05-12 Bugis Cube, Singapore 188735

UPLOAD_SELFIE_PHOTO_NOTE:
Upload your selfie photo with your identification card and note paper with the word “FinanceX” and the current date. Make sure the image contains the following:
  • Clear image
  • ID Card and note paper image
  • The note paper must have “FinanceX” and the current date
  • JPG or JPEG image format
  • Images must be less than 5MB
